ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
AutoGluon automates machine learning tasks enabling you to easily achieve strong
predictive performance in your applications. With just a few lines of code, you
can train and deploy high-accuracy machine learning and deep learning models on
image, text, time series, and tabular data.
about.summary: AutoML for Image, Text, and Tabular Data

commands: python -c "from autogluon.common import __version__ as v; from packaging.version import parse; expected = '1.4.0'; assert parse(v) == parse(expected), f'{v} != {expected}'"

about.description:
AutoGluon automates machine learning tasks enabling you to easily achieve strong
predictive performance in your applications. With just a few lines of code, you
can train and deploy high-accuracy machine learning and deep learning models on
image, text, time series, and tabular data.
about.summary: AutoML for Image, Text, and Tabular Data

commands: python -c "from autogluon.common import __version__ as v; from packaging.version import parse; expected = '1.4.0'; assert parse(v) == parse(expected), f'{v} != {expected}'"

name: autogluon.common
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "autogluon.common" %}
{% set version = "1.4.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz 
  sha256: 42e4838bb95328cedb54a9d094072068d8ce1e610a1154f91190b3670011561b

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install ./common -vv
  number: 1
  script_env:
    - RELEASE=1

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
  # see deps in https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/blob/master/common/setup.py
  # version bounds are defined in https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/blob/master/core/src/autogluon/core/_setup_utils.py
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }},<3.13
    - numpy <2.4.0,>=1.25.0
    - pandas <2.4.0,>=2.0.0
    - boto3 <2,>=1.10
    - psutil <7.1.0,>=5.7.3
    - tqdm <5,>=4.38
    - requests
    - joblib <1.7,>=1.2
    # Constrain pyarrow to avoid ABI incompatibility with libabseil
    # pyarrow >=19.0.0 requires newer libabseil that causes symbol conflicts
    - pyarrow >19.0.0,<21.0.0
    - setuptools
    - packaging

test:
  imports:
    - autogluon.common
  commands:
    - python -c "from autogluon.common import __version__ as v; from packaging.version import parse; expected = '{{ version }}'; assert parse(v) == parse(expected), f'{v} != {expected}'"
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://pypi.org/project/autogluon.common
  summary: AutoML for Image, Text, and Tabular Data
  description: |
    AutoGluon automates machine learning tasks enabling you to easily achieve strong 
    predictive performance in your applications. With just a few lines of code, you 
    can train and deploy high-accuracy machine learning and deep learning models on 
    image, text, time series, and tabular data.  
  dev_url: https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - shchur
    - suzhoum
    - tonyhoo
    - Innixma
    - prateekdesai04
